attributes.action: educate the 77 m children with no schooling - education as an alternative to war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Education is not prioritised in international aid - most care is of an emergency nature. But according to a Save the Children report, conflict affected regions receive less aid than they need. The petitioner is inviting the P.M. to increase by the receommended 4.2% funding allocated to humanitarian crises, recognising the role institutional education can play in restoring stability and providing alternatives to war, governance and economic growth.
